scenario.send:
INVITE sip:2202@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: "Sprachaufzeichnung" <sip:recorder@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Contact: <sip:recorder@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE User-Agent: asteriskdev1 Date: Thu, 17 Oct 2013 15:14:04 GMT Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, INFO, PUBLISH Supported: replaces, timer P-Asserted-Identity: "Sprachaufzeichnung" <sip:recorder@130.10.20.217> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=root 226987433 226987433 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Asterisk PBX 1.8.23.0 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] b=CT:128 t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 9 8 101 a=rtpmap:9 G722/8000 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-16 a=ptime:20 a=sendrecv m=video [media_port] RTP/AVP 31 34 98 99 a=rtpmap:31 H261/90000 a=rtpmap:34 H263/90000 a=rtpmap:98 h263-1998/90000 a=rtpmap:99 H264/90000 a=sendrecv
